title: Single image, explicit embed request
prompt: Add this product photo as the hero background and fade in the headline

title: Single image, explicit recreate request
prompt: Recreate this dashboard screenshot as a clean animated scene

title: Single image referencing existing scene
prompt: Update scene 2 to match this screenshot

title: Multiple images with per-image instructions
prompt: Create a split-screen: left is the UI screenshot, right is the product photo

title: Multiple images forming a collage
prompt: Make a grid with these three photos and add a title

title: Latest upload overrides earlier ones
prompt: Use this new screenshot instead of the previous one

title: Historical asset referenced by name
prompt: Bring back the 'Pricing Table' screenshot and highlight the totals

title: Voice prompt referencing recent upload
prompt: Animate this chart to slide up

title: Ambiguous multi-image request
prompt: Make a new scene with these

title: Embed image with overlay text
prompt: Show this product photo and overlay animated labels

title: Recreate with modified color palette
prompt: Rebuild this UI but convert it to dark mode

title: Replace embedded image in existing scene
prompt: In scene 1, swap the hero background with this updated shot

title: Edit scene to match new screenshot
prompt: Update the analytics scene to match this screenshot

title: Sequential screens
prompt: Create a carousel: first this onboarding screen, then this dashboard

title: Background embed with strong text
prompt: Create an energetic text scene using this background image

title: Reference prior-day upload
prompt: Still use the screenshot I uploaded yesterday and animate the cards

title: Mixed intent: recreate layout, embed photo
prompt: Use this UI screenshot as the layout but overlay the original photo

title: Embed with gradient readability
prompt: Place this photo and make the headline pop

title: Ambiguous reference to 'it'
prompt: Make it match this

title: Audio already added, now image
prompt: Add this screenshot as a new slide

title: Transparent logo over background
prompt: Put the transparent logo over this gradient

title: Recreate with animation direction
prompt: Recreate this dashboard and slide cards in sequentially

title: Scene edit replacing background image
prompt: In scene 4, replace the background with this gradient image

title: Blend colors from one image with layout from another
prompt: Blend the color scheme of this gradient with the layout of this dashboard

title: Scene attachment with new image
prompt: Here’s scene 2 and a new screenshot—update it to match

title: Follow-up referencing prior embed
prompt: I liked the layout—use this photo inside the second card

title: Image plus explicit duration
prompt: Use this screenshot to create a quick intro scene, 3 seconds long

title: Follow-up animation on earlier embed
prompt: Now animate the text we added over that photo

title: Multiple attachments, user corrects choice
prompt: Use the second screenshot; the first one was wrong

title: Asset metadata reference
prompt: Use the asset tagged 'kind:logo' as a floating element
